weaponModels.name: Round
weaponModels.description: The basic weapon for tank

weaponModels.name: Plasma
weaponModels.description:
Plasma generator is our new invention. Equal damage but faster firing rate than round

Unlock require ROUNDS RESEARCH level 1

weaponModels.name: Double Round
weaponModels.description:
In case of collision of double round with a regular round or plasma - only one round of two will be destroyed, the second one moves on

If your tank are not upgraded, you can purchase only 30 units

Unlock require ROUNDS RESEARCH level 2

weaponModels.name: Double Plasma
weaponModels.description:
If your tank are not upgraded, you can purchase only 30 units

Unlock require ROUNDS RESEARCH level 3

weaponModels.name: High-explosive Round
weaponModels.description:
High-explosive round is one of the most powerful round. Cause high damage to your enemies machine with big explosion

If your tank are not upgraded, you can purchase only 10 units

Unlock require ROUNDS RESEARCH level 4

weaponModels.name: Armor-piercing Round
weaponModels.description:
Heaviest round in this game, its damage is really terrible.

If your tank are not upgraded, you can purchase only 10 units

Unlock require ROUNDS RESEARCH level 5

weaponModels.name: Warhead
weaponModels.description:
Warhead does NOT fly OVER the walls, NOT destroy concrete wall and anti-tank hedgehogs. The damage is decreasing with every cell from the epicenter by 1, destroy all mines and support items within its explosion area

Unlimited range of fire.

Unlock require MISSILE RESEARCH level 1

weaponModels.name: Artillery
weaponModels.description:
This weapon can FLY OVER any walls or any obstacles, the damage is decreasing with every cell from the epicenter by 1, destroy all mines and support items within its explosion area.

Please notice about range of fire: 4 cell.

Unlock require ARTILLERY RESEARCH level 1

weaponModels.name: Mine TMD-5
weaponModels.description:
Explode and damage when enemies machine running over, but it's safe for your allies.

Unlock require MINE RESEARCH level 1

weaponModels.name: Mine TMD-9
weaponModels.description:
Powerful than Mine TMD-5. Explode and damage when enemies machine running over, but it's safe for your allies.

Unlock require MINE RESEARCH level 1

weaponModels.name: Dynamite x70
weaponModels.description:
Explode after 5 seconds after being planted. The damage is decreasing with every cell from the epicenter by 1, destroy all mines and support items within its explosion area.

Can destroy concrete walls and anti-tank hedgehogs

Unlock require DYNAMITE RESEARCH level 1

weaponModels.name: Dynamite x100
weaponModels.description:
Explode after 5 seconds after being planted. The damage is decreasing with every cell from the epicenter by 1, destroy all mines and support items within its explosion area.

Can destroy concrete walls and anti-tank hedgehogs

Unlock require DYNAMITE RESEARCH level 2

weaponModels.name: Dynamite x160
weaponModels.description:
Bigger explosion and damage, explode after 5 seconds after being planted. The damage is decreasing with every cell from the epicenter by 1, destroy all mines and support items within its explosion area.

Can destroy concrete walls and anti-tank hedgehogs

Unlock require DYNAMITE RESEARCH level 3

weaponModels.name: Homing Missile
weaponModels.description:
COMMING SOON!

Unlimited range of fire. It will controlled the same way as the tank, explode when hit 'fire' button. It flies OVER enemies tank, turret but NOT OVER walls, destroy all mines and support items within its explosion area.

Can destroy all id of stone walls (gray and yellow) and anti-tank hedgehogs, but NOT steel walls (they are invincible)

Unlock require MISSILE RESEARCH level 2

weaponModels.name: Air Strike
weaponModels.description:
Call a bomber aircraft to attack enemies, 5 explosions is on the flight path of bomber aircraft. The damage is decreasing with every cell from the epicenter by 1, destroy all mines and support items within its explosion area.

Can destroy concrete walls and anti-tank hedgehogs

Unlock require AIR ATTACK RESEARCH level 1 and RADAR on your tank

weaponModels.name: Ally Tank
weaponModels.description:
While in the game you can call for back up: an ally tank will appear at your base and follow you in a short distance.

Can be repair in workshop

The Allies Tank uses id of round equal THE BEST ROUND you had in your Tank. If you do not have rounds, it will use regular round

Unlock require ALLIES TANK RESEARCH level 1

weaponModels.name: Ally Kamikaze Tank
weaponModels.description:
While in the game you can call for back up: an ally kamikaze tank will appear at your base and follow you in a short distance. Destroy and make explosion area when near enemies tank. But be careful, it may hurt your ally units

Can be repair in workshop

Unlock require ALLIES TANK RESEARCH level 5

weaponModels.name: Ally Artillery Tank
weaponModels.description:
While in the game you can call for back up: an ally artillery tank will appear at your base and follow you in a short distance. Artillery Tank is the most powerful unit in this game, destroy any enemies in range with the deadly firearm - Artillery

Can be repair in workshop

Use the same level as your artillery. If you haven't researched Artillery Research yet, it can NOT fire Artillery, so please research it before purchasing this Ally Tank

Unlock require ALLIES TANK RESEARCH level 8

weaponModels.name: Force Field
weaponModels.description:
Every purchase gives your tank + 1 (blue) HP, when your tank is destroy, it WILL be lost. The maximum is 7 level

Force field regenerates itself (the more heal of your tank, the faster it regenerates)

Activate during the game by select it in your weapon list

Unlock require FORCE FIELD RESEARCH level 1

weaponModels.name: Repair Kit
weaponModels.description:
Restore 100% HP to any tank with is selected (player, allies and enemies tank), NOT include force field

Activate during the game by select it in your weapon list or 'fast repair' button

weaponModels.name: Boost Speed
weaponModels.description: Boost speed of your tank by 150% for 30 seconds. Can NOT stock

weaponModels.name: Time Freeze
weaponModels.description: Freeze enemies tank and turret (they can not move and attack) for 30 seconds. Can NOT stock

weaponModels.name: Temporary Armor
weaponModels.description:
Every purchase gives your tank + 1HP, when your tank is destroy, it WILL be lost. The maximum is 4 level

Unlock require ARMOR RESEARCH level 1

weaponModels.name: Permanent Armor
weaponModels.description:
Every purchase gives your tank + 1HP, when your tank is destroy, it WILL NOT be lost. The maximum is 4 level

Unlock require ARMOR RESEARCH level 2

weaponModels.name: Radar
weaponModels.description: Needed to be able to call up an air striker

weaponModels.name: Thermovision
weaponModels.description:
Every level of Thermo vision adds +1 cell to the range of detection mine (by default you can see mine within 1 cell)

The maximum is 3 level

weaponModels.name: Upgrade Tank
weaponModels.description:
Upgrade your tank to heavy type

-Change model.

-Increase round capacity of double round from 30 to 99, heavy round from 10 to 99.

Armor +3 HP

weaponModels.name: Tank Repair
weaponModels.description:
Restore 100% HP to your tank. Cheaper than repair kit, but you must go back to workshop to perform this action.

The cost of repair is 6$ for each 1HP lost

weaponModels.name: Ally Repair
weaponModels.description:
Restore 100% HP to all your allies tank. Cheaper than repair kit, but you must go back to workshop to perform this action.

The cost of repair is 5$ for each 1HP lost

weaponModels.name: Extra Life
weaponModels.description: You gain 1 life
